Reason: The 'network_authorizer' configuration is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'networkAuthCache' object is being initialized with 'DatabaseDescriptor.getNetworkAuthorizer()' which involves performance-related operations that can have a notable impact on system performance. The 'hasLocalAccess()' method in the 'AuthenticatedUser' class directly accesses the 'networkAuthCache' to check if the user has access to nodes in the local datacenter, which can lead to significant performance variations at the system level.
